list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: implement friendship listing in service and route updates
- Renamed `uuid` to `userUuid` in `GetFriendshipListDTO` for clarity. - Added `ListFriendService` method in `FriendshipService` for listing friendships by status (pending/accepted). - Introduced `GetFriendshipListQuery` and its validator in `FriendshipService`. - Updated `FriendshipRoutes` with support for listing friendships.

task.summary: Default task

feat: add new errors to `ErrorCatalog` and enhance `GetAllTournamentQueryHandler`
- Added `InvalidNumberOfParticipantsHistory` and `HistoryNotFound` errors in `ErrorCatalog`. - Updated `InternalBackendApiError` message for `verifyUserExists` endpoint. - Introduced `GetAllHistoryDTO` for handling username-based query logic. - Adjusted import paths in `GetAllTournamentQueryHandler` for consistency.

refactor: relocate query objects to `Domain` layer and update imports
- Moved `GetAllTournamentsQuery`, `GetTournamentQuery`, and other query objects to `Domain` layer. - Added `GetHistoryQuery` for handling username-based query logic. - Updated import paths across affected files for consistency.

refactor: relocate query handlers, validators to `Domain`, add `History` entity and update imports
- Moved `GetTournamentQueryHandler`, `GetUserQueryValidator`, and related logic to `Domain` layer. - Added `History` entity for managing tournament history details. - Updated import paths across affected modules for consistency.

feat: implement `HistoryService` with `Create` method, add `History` and `MatchMaking` models to Prisma schema
- Introduced `HistoryService` to manage tournament history creation and processing. - Added `History` and `MatchMaking` models to `tournament.prisma` schema for tracking matches and histories. - Updated `backend.prisma` schema formatting for consistency.

feat: add new errors to `ErrorCatalog` and update history validation logic
- Added `PlayerCantPlayAgainstSelf` and `NegativePoints` errors to `ErrorCatalog` for enhanced validation. - Renamed `GetAllHistoryDTO` and `GetHistoryQuery` to `GetAllHistoriesDTO` and `GetAllHistoriesQuery`. - Updated `CreateHistoryValidator` to enforce validation for self-play and negative points.

feat: add `GetAllHistoriesQueryHandler`, `GetAllHistoriesViewModel`, and DTO for history retrieval
- Implemented `GetAllHistoriesQueryHandler` to handle history retrieval by username. - Added `GetAllHistoriesViewModel` for mapping DTO data to a user-friendly format. - Introduced `GetAllHistoriesQueryDTO` to structure history query data. - Updated `GetAllTournamentsDTO` to replace `userUuid` with `username`.

feat: add `GetAllHistoriesQueryHandler`, `GetAllHistoriesViewModel`, and DTO for history retrieval
- Implemented `GetAllHistoriesQueryHandler` to handle history retrieval by username. - Added `GetAllHistoriesViewModel` for mapping DTO data to a user-friendly format. - Introduced `GetAllHistoriesQueryDTO` to structure history query data. - Updated `GetAllTournamentsDTO` to replace `userUuid` with `username`.

feat: implement `GetAllHistories` in `HistoryService` and update `GetAllTournamentsDTO`
- Added `GetAll` method in `HistoryService` to retrieve tournament histories based on username. - Updated `GetAllTournamentsDTO` to replace `userUuid` with `username`.

feat: implement `GetAllHistories` in `HistoryService` and update `GetAllTournamentsDTO`
- Added `GetAll` method in `HistoryService` to retrieve tournament histories based on username. - Updated `GetAllTournamentsDTO` to replace `userUuid` with `username`.

feat: integrate `BackendApiClient` for user validation and win/lose tracking
- Added `BackendApiClient` to `CreateHistoryCommandHandler` for tracking user win/lose metrics. - Renamed methods in `BackendApiClient` for consistency (`verifyUserExists` to `VerifyIfUsersExists`). - Introduced `AddWinLoseForUser` method in `BackendApiClient`. - Updated validators to use the newly renamed methods.

feat: add matchmaking-related DTOs, query objects, and new validation errors
- Introduced `GenerateMatchmakingDTO`, `GenerateMatchmakingQuery`, and `GenerateMatchmakingQueryDTO` for matchmaking logic. - Added `NegativeWins` error to `ErrorCatalog` for validation of win values. - Updated `ErrorCatalog` messages for consistency in backend API error naming.

refactor: rename method in `IBackendApiClient` and update logs for clarity
- Renamed `verifyUserExists` to `VerifyIfUsersExists` in `IBackendApiClient` for consistency. - Enhanced error logging in `index.ts` for better debugging. - Minor formatting updates in `HistoryRepository`.

feat: implement matchmaking controller, view model, and query handlers
- Added `MatchmakingController` with matchmaking logic and integration via `GenerateMatchmakingDTO`. - Introduced `GenerateMatchmakingViewModel` to structure matchmaking data. - Implemented `GenerateMatchmakingQueryHandler` and `GenerateMatchmakingQueryValidator` for query processing and validation.

feat: add matchmaking service, user search method, and update routes
- Implemented `MatchmakingService` with preliminary `Generate` logic. - Added `SearchForClosestOpponent` method in `UserRepository` for matchmaking user search based on win ratio and matches played. - Updated `UserRoutes` with corrected endpoint `/users/exists`. - Extended `NotificationError` with `SetAllErrorsToString` method for better error handling.

chore: add missing newline and leave TODO for additional validators
- Fixed missing newline in `GenerateMatchmakingQueryValidator.ts`. - Added a TODO placeholder to include validators for additional getters.
chore: add TODO placeholders for unimplemented methods in `BackendApiClient`

feat: enhance matchmaking logic in `UserRepository` and add `GetUserMatchmakingQueryDTO`
- Updated `SearchForClosestOpponent` to refine candidate selection based on win ratio differences. - Implemented a fallback `SearchForAnyOpponent` method for broader matchmaking. - Added `mapToUserMatchmakingQueryDTO` for structured matchmaking data mapping. - Introduced `GetUserMatchmakingQueryDTO` to support detailed matchmaking query responses.

feat: update matchmaking DTOs and queries to support total games and username
- Replaced `uuid` with `username` in `GenerateMatchmakingDTO` and `GenerateMatchmakingQuery`. - Added `totalGames` property to DTOs and queries for enhanced matchmaking logic. - Updated `BackendApiClient` with new methods for user verification and opponent search. - Added `NegativeValues` error to `ErrorCatalog` for input validation.

refactor: replace `HistoryRepository` with `BackendApiClient` in `GenerateMatchmakingQueryHandler` and update validation
- Updated `Handler` to use `BackendApiClient` for opponent search and user validation. - Extended input validation to include `totalGames` check. - Replaced `uuid` with `username` in user validation and opponent search methods.

refactor: replace `HistoryRepository` with `BackendApiClient` in `GenerateMatchmakingQueryHandler` and update validation
- Updated `Handler` to use `BackendApiClient` for opponent search and user validation. - Extended input validation to include `totalGames` check. - Replaced `uuid` with `username` in user validation and opponent search methods.

refactor: simplify `SearchForClosestOpponent` and enhance `MatchmakingService`
- Removed unnecessary `paremterLoses` parameter from `SearchForClosestOpponent`. - Refactored `MatchmakingService` to include enhanced query validation and error handling. - Updated `Generate` method to return detailed matchmaking results using `GetUserMatchmakingViewModel`.
refactor: remove unused `GenerateMatchmakingQueryDTO` and `GenerateMatchmakingViewModel` classes

refactor: switch matchmaking input from body to query parameters
- Updated `GenerateMatchmaking` method in `MatchmakingController` to use query parameters instead of request body. - Adjusted `MatchmakingRoutes` to reflect the new query-based input. - Enhanced input validation with querystring schema in `MatchmakingRoutes`.

feat: add token generation utility and improve coding style consistency
- Added `generateToken` function in `AuthMiddleware` for JWT creation with a 1-hour expiration. - Enhanced code formatting across `AuthMiddleware` and `BaseController` for better readability. - Adjusted imports and structure of handler files during package reorganization.

feat: implement JWT-based login flow with improved DTO and ViewModel structure
- Added `Login` method in `LoginUserService` to handle user login with JWT generation. - Introduced `LoginUserViewModel` for structured token response. - Refactored DTO imports and file paths for better organization. - Updated `UserSessionRoutes` and `UserSessionController` to integrate new login logic.
Merge: arquivos trazidos do merge

feat: add `TokenBlacklistService` and integrate Redis dependency
- Created `TokenBlacklistService` for managing blacklisted JWT tokens. - Added Redis client as a dependency for handling token storage. - Updated `package.json` to include `redis` dependency.

feat: enhance authentication and security with token validation and CORS
- Integrated `TokenBlacklistService` in `AuthMiddleware` for token revocation checks. - Implemented `helmet` for improved security headers. - Added `fastifyCors` for handling cross-origin requests. - Updated error handling and token validation logic in `AuthMiddleware`.

feat: enhance logout and login services with token handling and security improvements
- Integrated `TokenBlacklistService` to revoke tokens during logout. - Enhanced `LogoutUserService` to handle token blacklisting from cookies. - Updated `LoginUserService` with secure cookie settings for JWT storage. - Added `JWTPayload` interface for better token structure. - Integrated `helmet`, `cookie`, and `fastifyCors` for improved security and CORS handling.

feat: add Fastify plugins to improve security and CORS handling
- Integrated `@fastify/cookie`, `@fastify/cors`, and `@fastify/helmet` for enhanced security and functionality. - Added `@types/sanitize-html` to devDependencies for improved HTML sanitization type support.

feat: enhance login flow with secure cookie-based JWT storage
- Added HTTP-only, secure, and same-site cookie settings for storing JWTs in `UserSessionRoutes`. - Updated `LoginUserService` to pass `reply` for cookie handling. - Improved authentication response structure with user details.

feat: add `SanitizeHelper` utility for data validation
- Introduced `SanitizeHelper` with methods for boolean and number sanitization. - Added static utility functions to enhance input validation consistency.

feat: extend `SanitizeHelper` with date-sanitization utility
- Added `SanitizerDate` method for validating and sanitizing date inputs. - Enhanced `SanitizerNumber` to handle null and undefined values more robustly.

refactor: rename and restructure `LogoutUserService` methods
- Renamed `Execute` method to `Logout` for clarity and consistency. - Added unimplemented `Execute` placeholder to support future modifications. - Removed redundant import from `game-service/src/index.ts`.

feat: add Redis integration and enhance `LogoutUserService` logic
- Added `redis` dependency to manage session storage and caching (`package.json`, `package-lock.json`). - Updated `LogoutUserService` to support passing `request` alongside session data. - Introduced Redis client packages for modular functionality: `@redis/client`, `@redis/bloom`, `@redis/json`, `@redis/search`, `@redis/time-series`.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into fix/login-logout

user-service/src/index.ts

refactor: remove redundant `VerifyIfUserExistsByUuidsService` and unused query handler
- Deleted `VerifyIfUserExistsByUuidsService` method and related query handler for cleanup. - Added `qs` and `@types/qs` to dependencies for handling query string parsing. - Updated `package-lock.json` with new dependency installations.

refactor: remove redundant `VerifyIfUserExistsByUuidsService` and unused query handler
- Deleted `VerifyIfUserExistsByUuidsService` method and related query handler for cleanup. - Added `qs` and `@types/qs` to dependencies for handling query string parsing. - Updated `package-lock.json` with new dependency installations.

feat: add `anonymous` property to user commands and refactor constructors
- Introduced `anonymous` property in `EditUserCommand` and `CreateUserCommand` for enhanced user data handling. - Updated constructors and DTO mappings to support the new property. - Removed unused comment in `BackendApiClient`.

feat: add `GetAllUsers` method and update constructors for enhanced user handling
- Introduced `GetAllUsers` method in `GetUserService` to fetch all users. - Added `GetAll` method in `GetUserQueryHandler` for querying all users. - Updated `GetUserViewModel` constructor to support nullable numerical values. - Refactored imports and service assignments in `index.ts`.

feat: add `GetAllUsers` method and update constructors for enhanced user handling
- Introduced `GetAllUsers` method in `GetUserService` to fetch all users. - Added `GetAll` method in `GetUserQueryHandler` for querying all users. - Updated `GetUserViewModel` constructor to support nullable numerical values. - Refactored imports and service assignments in `index.ts`.

feat: add `ChangeRequestFriendStatusCommandValidator` and update friendship handlers
- Introduced `ChangeRequestFriendStatusCommandValidator` for validating friend status change commands. - Updated `AddRequestFriendCommandHandler` and `ChangeRequestFriendStatusCommandHandler` with corrected method calls and async handling. - Refactored constructor parameters to fix type mismatches.

feat: enhance friendship handling and repository methods
- Added `FastifyReply` for reply handling in `FriendshipService`. - Introduced new constructor dependencies and refactored `FriendshipService` handlers. - Updated friendship repository methods with improved typing and additional utility functions. - Changed `Friendship` entity to support mutable `status`.

feat: improve friendship handling and add route definitions
- Extended `FriendshipController` with `BaseController` inheritance and introduced `notificationError` for better error handling. - Fixed incorrect parameter mapping in `AddFriend` method. - Renamed and refactored `ListFriendshipStatus` to `FriendshipStatusList` for clarity. - Created `GetFriendshipListDTO` for handling friendship listing. - Added `FriendshipRoutes` for managing friendship-related endpoints, including `addFriend`, `changeRequestStatus`, and `friendsList`.

feat: add `GetFriendshipListQuery` and its validator
- Created `GetFriendshipListQuery` to structure friendship listing queries. - Added `GetFriendshipListQueryValidator` for validation of query input, including user existence verification and error handling.

feat: implement `GetFriendshipListQueryHandler` and enhance repository
- Added `GetFriendshipListQueryHandler` for handling friendship listing queries. - Updated `FriendshipRepository` with query DTO mapping and improved methods for retrieving friendships. - Introduced `GetFriendshipListQueryDTO` to structure friendship listing response data.

feat: improve validation and null-safety in friend request commands
- Fixed user existence verification in `AddRequestFriendCommandValidator`. - Added `status` property to `AddRequestFriendDTO` for better friend request status management. - Improved null-safety in `ChangeRequestFriendStatusCommandHandler` with type adjustments. - Refactored imports in `ChangeRequestFriendStatusCommand`.

feat: refactor `FriendshipController` and update repository methods
- Added `FriendshipService` dependency to `FriendshipController` for improved service handling. - Made controller methods public for better accessibility. - Updated `ChangeRequestFriendStatusDTO` with renamed `friendshipUuid` property. - Enhanced `FriendshipRepository` with improved typing, utility functions, and `fromDatabase` method for entity mapping. - Refactored `Friendship` entity to support mutable fields and introduced static `fromDatabase` method.

feat: implement friendship listing in service and route updates
- Renamed `uuid` to `userUuid` in `GetFriendshipListDTO` for clarity. - Added `ListFriendService` method in `FriendshipService` for listing friendships by status (pending/accepted). - Introduced `GetFriendshipListQuery` and its validator in `FriendshipService`. - Updated `FriendshipRoutes` with support for listing friendships.

MESSAGE.value:
feat: add `TokenBlacklistService` and integrate Redis dependency
- Created `TokenBlacklistService` for managing blacklisted JWT tokens. - Added Redis client as a dependency for handling token storage. - Updated `package.json` to include `redis` dependency.

feat: enhance authentication and security with token validation and CORS
- Integrated `TokenBlacklistService` in `AuthMiddleware` for token revocation checks. - Implemented `helmet` for improved security headers. - Added `fastifyCors` for handling cross-origin requests. - Updated error handling and token validation logic in `AuthMiddleware`.

feat: improve authentication and security in user session flows
- Added token blacklisting in `LogoutUserService` via `TokenBlacklistService`. - Implemented secure HTTP-only cookies for JWT storage in `LoginUserService`. - Introduced `JWTPayload` interface for structured JWT claims. - Enhanced app security with `helmet`, `cookie`, and CORS support in `index.ts`.

feat: enhance logout and login services with token handling and security improvements
- Integrated `TokenBlacklistService` to revoke tokens during logout. - Enhanced `LogoutUserService` to handle token blacklisting from cookies. - Updated `LoginUserService` with secure cookie settings for JWT storage. - Added `JWTPayload` interface for better token structure. - Integrated `helmet`, `cookie`, and `fastifyCors` for improved security and CORS handling.

feat: add Fastify plugins to improve security and CORS handling
- Integrated `@fastify/cookie`, `@fastify/cors`, and `@fastify/helmet` for enhanced security and functionality. - Added `@types/sanitize-html` to devDependencies for improved HTML sanitization type support.

feat: enhance login flow with secure cookie-based JWT storage
- Added HTTP-only, secure, and same-site cookie settings for storing JWTs in `UserSessionRoutes`. - Updated `LoginUserService` to pass `reply` for cookie handling. - Improved authentication response structure with user details.

feat: add `SanitizeHelper` utility for data validation
- Introduced `SanitizeHelper` with methods for boolean and number sanitization. - Added static utility functions to enhance input validation consistency.

feat: extend `SanitizeHelper` with date-sanitization utility
- Added `SanitizerDate` method for validating and sanitizing date inputs. - Enhanced `SanitizerNumber` to handle null and undefined values more robustly.

refactor: rename and restructure `LogoutUserService` methods
- Renamed `Execute` method to `Logout` for clarity and consistency. - Added unimplemented `Execute` placeholder to support future modifications. - Removed redundant import from `game-service/src/index.ts`.

feat: add Redis integration and enhance `LogoutUserService` logic
- Added `redis` dependency to manage session storage and caching (`package.json`, `package-lock.json`). - Updated `LogoutUserService` to support passing `request` alongside session data. - Introduced Redis client packages for modular functionality: `@redis/client`, `@redis/bloom`, `@redis/json`, `@redis/search`, `@redis/time-series`.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
feat: implement friendship listing in service and route updates
- Renamed `uuid` to `userUuid` in `GetFriendshipListDTO` for clarity. - Added `ListFriendService` method in `FriendshipService` for listing friendships by status (pending/accepted). - Introduced `GetFriendshipListQuery` and its validator in `FriendshipService`. - Updated `FriendshipRoutes` with support for listing friendships.
